posts.topic: Medicare for All
posts.name: HealthForAll
posts.text: Healthcare should be a right, not a privilege. America needs Medicare for All now!

posts.topic: Government Should Stay Out of Healthcare
posts.name: FreeMarketHealth
posts.text: Government-run healthcare leads to inefficiency and long wait times. The free market works better!

posts.topic: The Cost of Prescription Drugs
posts.name: LowerDrugPrices
posts.text: Americans pay the highest drug prices in the world. Big Pharma must be regulated!

posts.topic: Regulating Drug Prices Hurts Innovation
posts.name: InnovationFirst
posts.text: If we regulate drug prices, companies will stop investing in new life-saving treatments!

posts.topic: Expanding Medicaid
posts.name: MedicaidForMore
posts.text: Medicaid should be expanded to cover more low-income individuals. No one should go bankrupt for getting sick!

posts.topic: Medicaid Expansion Will Bankrupt States
posts.name: FiscalConservative
posts.text: Expanding Medicaid will cost taxpayers billions. States can't afford this burden!

posts.topic: Health Insurance Should Not Be Tied to Employment
posts.name: DecoupleHealth
posts.text: Losing your job shouldn't mean losing your health insurance. The system is broken!

posts.topic: Employer-Based Healthcare Works
posts.name: KeepPrivateInsurance
posts.text: Employer-sponsored insurance gives workers better coverage and choices. Don't mess with it!

posts.topic: The Role of Telemedicine in Healthcare Reform
posts.name: DigitalHealth
posts.text: Telemedicine has revolutionized healthcare access. Should insurance fully cover virtual visits?

posts.topic: Universal Healthcare Saves Money in the Long Run
posts.name: CostEffectiveCare
posts.text: Countries with universal healthcare actually spend less per capita on medical costs than the U.S. does!

posts.topic: Doctors Should Be Paid More
posts.name: SupportDoctors
posts.text: Doctors train for years and save lives. They should be paid more, not less!

posts.topic: Medical Debt Forgiveness
posts.name: CancelMedicalDebt
posts.text: No one should go bankrupt because they got sick. The U.S. should cancel medical debt!

posts.topic: How to Solve the Nursing Shortage
posts.name: MoreNurses
posts.text: The healthcare system is struggling due to a nursing shortage. What policies can fix this?

posts.topic: Should Cosmetic Surgery Be Covered by Insurance?
posts.name: EssentialOrLuxury
posts.text: Some cosmetic surgeries are medically necessary. Should insurance cover them all?

posts.topic: The Future of AI in Healthcare
posts.name: AIHealthCare
posts.text: AI is improving diagnostics and treatment. Will it reduce healthcare costs or replace doctors?

posts.topic: Should Mental Health Be Covered Like Physical Health?
posts.name: MentalHealthMatters
posts.text: Mental health is just as important as physical health. Insurance should fully cover therapy and treatment!

posts.topic: Private Insurance Gives Better Coverage
posts.name: BetterWithPrivate
posts.text: Government-run healthcare leads to rationing. Private insurance offers better quality care and access!

posts.topic: How to Fix Rural Healthcare Access
posts.name: HealthcareForAll
posts.text: Rural communities lack doctors and hospitals. What policies can improve healthcare access?

posts.topic: Should Employers Be Required to Provide Health Insurance?
posts.name: JobBenefitsDebate
posts.text: Should companies be required to offer healthcare benefits, or should individuals be responsible for their own coverage?

posts.topic: How Can We Reduce ER Overuse?
posts.name: EmergencyRoomCrisis
posts.text: Many people use the ER for non-emergencies. How can we reduce costs and improve efficiency?
